name: diversifier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of investment (= something that you put money into in order to make a profit) that you add to others in order to reduce the total risk of your investments: Commodities can be great diversifiers in a portfolio. These investments are particularly suitable for a pension fund as a risk diversifier. Related word
diversify
More examplesFewer examplesReal estate can appear to be a better portfolio diversifier than it really is.Direct property funds are a more suitable long-term diversifier .Hedge funds aren't the only diversifiers that have failed to fulfil their purpose during the crisis.
